item.title: Discussing Coffee with Marco Lavazza at the US Open
item.description:
Discussing Coffee with Marco Lavazza at the US Open

It's been a big year for Lavazza. Not only is it their 120th anniversary, they've also partnered with the Italian Pavillon at the World Exposition Milan 2015 and expanded their tennis partnerships to include a sponsorship of the US Open.

item.title: Jet Engine Espresso Machines : veloce espresso

item.title: Projections in the Forest
item.description:
Projections in the Forest

Behind the scenes: http://vimeo.com/3hund/behindthescenes The projection mapping "bioluminescent forest" is made by artists Friedrich van Schoor and Tarek Mawad. The artists spent six weeks in the forest fascinated by the silence and natural occurrences in nature, especially the phenomenon "bioluminescence".
